Scripts.OnClick: local parent = this:GetParent() local label = getglobal(this:GetName().."Label") local list = parent.list local dispatch = parent.callback dispatch(label:GetText(), "click", this:GetName(), arg1)
Scripts.OnEnter: local parent = this:GetParent() local label = getglobal(this:GetName().."Label") local list = parent.list local dispatch = parent.callback dispatch(label:GetText(), "enter", this:GetName())

Scripts.OnClick: local scrollamount = this:GetParent().maxitems or 1 this:GetParent().CurrentItem = this:GetParent().CurrentItem - scrollamount FB_Menu_Display(this:GetParent():GetName())
local scrollamount = this:GetParent().maxitems or 1 this:GetParent().CurrentItem = this:GetParent().CurrentItem + scrollamount FB_Menu_Display(this:GetParent():GetName())
if FBMenuScript:IsVisible() then FBMenuScript:Hide() else FB_Show_Scripts_Dropdown() end
if this:GetChecked() then FBToggles["notooltips"] = true else FBToggles["notooltips"] = false end
if this:GetChecked() then FBToggles["verbose"] = true else FBToggles["verbose"] = false end
if this:GetChecked() then FBToggles["forceshading"] = true else FBToggles["forceshading"] = false end
if this:GetChecked() then FBToggles["autoperf"] = true else FBToggles["autoperf"] = false end
if this:GetChecked() then FBToggles["raidsafe"] = true else FBToggles["raidsafe"] = false end
local util = Utility_Class:New() local _,_,number = string.find(this:GetName(),"(%d+)") number = number + 0 FB_AutoItemOnClick(number,this,this:GetParent())
